3.1 Hawkes ModelÂ¶

Hawkes model is an implementation of Bivariate Hawkes process for modelling high frequency financial transaction data:

>>> from va.models.hawkes import hawkes
>>> myHawkes = hawkes()
>>> myHawkes.fit(Price)
>>> myHawkes.predict(ahead = 2)
